name: Football (Programma International)
overview: Football allows two players to compete in a match of American Football. The players can determine the actual length of the game as well as the names for the teams. The game is played by selecting an action each turn. Once both players have selected an action an animation is shown in which the action is played out. Offensive actions are: Short pass, Long pass, Off tackle, Reverse, Field goal, Punt, Sweep, Defensive actions are: Blitz, 3-4, 4-3, Prevent, Stack
